translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Thomaka

analyzed: deva loke santaḥ  vipassissa mahesinaḥ  dhammam suṇitvā muditaḥ
translated: “Standing in the world of the gods,🔽I heard the Dhamma of the Great Seer Vipassī.
‘I pay homage to you, O Wise One among Men,
I pay homage to you, O Supreme One among Men;
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of Thomaka.
The six supernormal knowledges have been realized,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā thomako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā thomakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: the Buddha’s instruction has been accomplished.”🔽Thus have I heard. On that occasion the Venerable Thomaka recited these verses.
Thomaka the Elder’s Birth Story is the first.
